header.text: A student organisation that aims to create an inclusive environment around gaming and e-sports for the students at UiO
about.title: Who are we?
about.text: UiO Gaming is a student organisation with a primary focus on creating an inclusive environment around gaming and e-sports. We wish to establish a community where itâ€™s easy to make new friends and cultivate your gaming interests. Each week we host both casual and more intense gamenights, as well as physical events such as board game nights and other social gatherings. Our main channel is a Discord server where you can meet new people with common interests and play games with other students.
events.title: Upcoming events
office.title: The office
office.text: We have an office at Chateau Neuf where you can use our gear and hang out with other members! We've got all the latest and greatest consoles, 6 high-end PCs as well as a plethora of board games.
office.tip: Tip: You can look around the office by clicking and dragging the image below ðŸ‘€
